name: Age of Discovery
description:
A top down 2D RPG.  W,A,S,D or the arrow keys for movement.  Mouse buttons for menus and actions.

Keep track of your mana, save often heal often.

This is just the demo that will be used when pitching the game to publishers and investors.  The full game has 7 continents, custom character and you pick your 2 additional party members.
developers: Rob Broad - Owner of Bonehead Games
